home.description: Helloüôè, my name is Nontachai Prosri. I am a software developer with experience in developing fullstack web applications using React, Vue, Nuxt3, Node.js, and MySQL. I can develop and maintain both frontend and backend parts and am committed to learning new technologies to develop efficient applications that meet user needs. I hope to bring my skills to benefit your organization. üéâ

project.title: My Projects
project.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

projectOne.title: Graduation Project
projectOne.description: Graduation Project RMUTI(CPE64241A) - Market Stall Reservation System
projectOne.detail: Developed the project using HTML, CSS, JS, and PHP (without using any framework). It includes API usage and database connection, with features for user login and market stall reservation.

projectTwo.title: Internship Project
projectTwo.description: Developed an internal project management system for the organization
projectTwo.detail: Developed the project using Frontend with Nuxt3 Vue.js and Vuetify, then developed Backend with Node.js Express and MySQL, including auth and various modules for project management.
